name: teable
description: Teable is an open-source, self-hosted Airtable alternative with relational tables, views, and collaboration features. It provides forms, filters, and integrations through a modern web UI and REST API, with optional managed hosting.

features.title: Relational Tables
features.description: Create interconnected tables with relationships, lookups, and rollups for complex data modeling

features.title: Multiple Views
features.description: Display data in grid, kanban, gallery, calendar, or form views to match different workflows

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Work together in real-time with team members on shared bases with granular permission controls

features.title: Forms
features.description: Generate public or private forms from tables to collect data from users without database access

features.title: Filtering And Sorting
features.description: Apply complex filters and multi-level sorting to focus on relevant data subsets

features.title: REST API
features.description: Access and manipulate data programmatically through a comprehensive REST API for integrations

features.title: Field Types
features.description: Use rich field types including text, numbers, dates, attachments, checkboxes, and formulas

features.title: Formulas
features.description: Calculate values dynamically using spreadsheet-like formulas with functions and field references
